days.title: Rose Day
days.subtitle: A rose for the most beautiful person.
days.message: Even a thousand roses can't compare to your beauty.

days.title: Propose Day
days.subtitle: Confessing my feelings...
days.message: I don't need the whole world, I just need you. Will you be mine forever?

days.title: Chocolate Day
days.subtitle: Sweetness overloaded!
days.message: Life is like a chocolate box, and you are my favorite flavor.

days.title: Teddy Day
days.subtitle: A warm hug in a teddy.
days.message: Sending you a teddy to cuddle when I'm not there.

days.title: Promise Day
days.subtitle: A promise of forever.
days.message: I promise to walk with you, hold your hand, and love you until the end of time.

days.title: Hug Day
days.subtitle: Embracing you tightly.
days.message: Your arms are my favorite place to be. Sending you a big warm hug!

days.title: Kiss Day
days.subtitle: Sealed with a kiss.
days.message: A kiss is a secret told to the mouth instead of the ear.

days.title: Valentine's Day
days.subtitle: The Day of Love
days.message: Happy Valentine's Day! You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
